data.name: Cardseer
data.detailed_description:
Fast paced card combat meets strategic deck building and intriguing item choices in the world of Cardseer. Approachable for newcomers with depth for veterans, choose one of 4 distinct classes with powerful and unique abilities, cards and artifacts, then take on the host of dangerous enemies standing in your way. Build your deck along the way and adapt to each challenge thrown your way.




Cardseer features a campaign with an intriguing and interactive story. Uncover a dark plot to sow discord between the peoples of Aventia as you choose your path across the continent. The choices you make and the characters you meet along the way will change the course of history. Those seeking a challenge will want to venture into the Gauntlet, where you fight your way through randomized regions to claim ultimate glory.




  • 5 distinct playable class
  • Campaign stories for all classes
  • At least 5 regions to explore in both Campaign and Gauntlet
  • Hundreds of cards and artifacts to master,
  • Endless dungeon crawl, daily challenges, unlockable cosmetics and more

data.short_description: Formerly known as Aventia. Card combat with a Roguelike twist! Choose 1 of 4 unique classes, construct your deck, equip game-changing artifacts and battle fearsome foes in Cardseer!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 +
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 +
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics with at least 1 GB of VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
